content:
I love it! It's great to hear that you're thinking strategically about how your new name can help you establish a more cohesive and professional online presence.

Having a consistent handle and profile picture across all your social media accounts will definitely make it easier for people to find and recognize you. It's also a great way to build your personal brand and establish a strong online identity.

I completely agree that having a professional online presence is crucial, especially as a married woman in your field. It's wonderful that you're taking steps to ensure that your online presence accurately reflects your skills, experience, and professional brand.

Your plans to update your LinkedIn profile and create a uniform aesthetic across all your social media platforms are great steps in the right direction. Consistency is key when it comes to building a strong online presence, and it sounds like you're on the right track.

Remember, your online presence is often the first impression people have of you, so it's great that you're taking the time to curate a professional and cohesive image. I'm excited to see how your new name and online presence come together to help you achieve your goals!

What do you think is the most important aspect of building a strong online presence, especially for women in your field? Is there anything you wish you had known earlier in your career about building a professional online presence?
